alert.note: Alert for Orange (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:16PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ORANGE COUNTY THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Paoli, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paoli, Orleans, Stampers Creek, Orangeville, Bromer, Leipsic, Woodlawn Grove, Trotter Crossing, Braxtons Siding and Chambersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
